SESSION_ID.description: Your session ID for WhatsApp Web.

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Enable auto status viewing. Set to 'true' to enable.

AUTO_READ.description: Enable auto message reading. Set to 'true' to enable.

AUTO_TYPING.description: Enable auto typing status. Set to 'true' to enable.

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Enable auto recording status. Set to 'true' to enable.

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Keep the bot always online. Set to 'true' to enable.

AUTO_BLOCK.description: Enable auto-blocking for numbers starting with '212'. Set to 'true' to enable.

REJECT_CALL.description: Automatically reject incoming calls. Set to 'true' to enable.

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Send an automatic reply after viewing a status. Set to 'true' to enable.

STATUS_READ_MSG.description: Message to send when replying to a status automatically.

PREFIX.description: The command prefix for the bot. Default is '.'.
